course_title: Professional Series IV: Nursing Leadership: Partnership, Policy, and Professional Development
class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 3 students only. Online with synchronous sessions via zoom.
course_description: This course prepares students for transition to independent practice as a professional nurse. Emphasis is on understanding requirements for licensure, scope of practice, leadership/management roles, information technology, professional organizations, and advocacy.
sections: Class Nbr: 1811, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: TTh 12:30-2:30p, Instructor: T. Tanner, Status: Open
